-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A type class and some utilities for generating Haskell code.
--   
--   A type class and some utilities for generating Haskell code.
@package to-haskell
@version 0.3.0


-- | Conversion to Haskell code, plus utilities
module Language.Haskell.Exts.ToHaskell
class ToHS a
toHS :: ToHS a => a -> HDoc
type HDoc = Prec -> Exp
type Prec = Int
showsPrecHS :: ToHS a => Prec -> a -> ShowS
appHS :: Binop HDoc
ifHS :: Ternop HDoc
lamHS :: Pat -> Unop HDoc
letHS :: Pat -> Binop HDoc
tupleHS :: [HDoc] -> HDoc
infixHS :: String -> Maybe (Binop HDoc)
hsName :: String -> HDoc
hsShow :: Show a => a -> HDoc
class ToHSPat a
toHSPat :: ToHSPat a => a -> Pat


-- | Supply monad
module Language.NameSupply
type Supply x = State [x]

-- | Generate a new variable name
supplyNew :: Supply x x

-- | All names made purely of lower-case alphabetic characters, ordered by
--   increasing size (starting with one) and alphabetically within each
--   size.
allNames :: [Name]
type Name = String
type NameM = Supply Name
withNames :: [Name] -> NameM a -> a
withAllNames :: NameM a -> a
